      • testAndInvalidateToken

        public static boolean testAndInvalidateToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Retrieves the token from the requests and tests if this token belongs to the current session. If the token is associated with the session, the token will be removed from the session and cannot be reused again.
        Returns:
        true if the request contains a token and this token belongs to the session, false otherwise

      • addToken

        public static void addToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
